testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual real estate functionality beyond basic placeholder content
steps: Navigate to application homepage
Verify property search functionality exists
Check for property listings or search results
Verify navigation menu has real estate specific options (Properties, Search, Login, etc.)
Confirm application shows real estate content, not just 'Vite + React' placeholder
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays functional real estate platform with property search, listings, and navigation
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or generic content, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Homepage Content Quality Test
testCases.description: Verify homepage displays professional real estate content and branding
steps: Load homepage/landing page
Check for NatureEstate branding and logo
Verify hero section with property search or featured properties
Look for professional real estate imagery
Check for clear value proposition about nature/scenic properties
testCases.expectedOutcome: Homepage shows professional real estate platform focused on natural/scenic properties

testCases.name: Navigation Structure Test
testCases.description: Test main navigation menu and routing functionality
steps: Check top navigation bar exists
Verify key navigation links: Home, Search, Properties, Login/Register
Test mobile navigation menu if on mobile device
Click each navigation link to verify routing works
Check footer navigation exists
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete navigation system with working links to all major sections

testCases.name: Property Search Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test the core property search feature with filters and results
steps: Navigate to search page or find search form
Test basic text search functionality
Try location-based search (country, region, city)
Test price range filters
Test property type filters (villa, cabin, condo, etc.)
Test natural features search
Verify search results display properly
Check sorting options work
testCases.expectedOutcome: Comprehensive search system with multiple filters returning relevant property results

testCases.name: User Authentication Flow Test
testCases.description: Test complete user authentication system including login, registration, and logout
steps: Navigate to login page
Test login form with valid credentials (john.doe@example.com / password123)
Verify successful login redirects to dashboard
Check user profile/account information displays
Test logout functionality
Navigate to registration page
Test registration form validation
Verify password reset functionality exists
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete authentication system with login, registration, and user management

testCases.name: Property Details View Test
testCases.description: Test individual property detail pages with comprehensive information
steps: Navigate to a property listing from search results
Verify property details page loads with complete information
Check property photos/image gallery
Verify property specifications (price, bedrooms, bathrooms, etc.)
Check location information and map if available
Test property inquiry/contact functionality
Verify owner/agent information displays
testCases.expectedOutcome: Detailed property pages with comprehensive information, photos, and contact options

testCases.name: User Dashboard Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test user dashboard with role-specific features and content
steps: Login as buyer user (john.doe@example.com / password123)
Navigate to user dashboard
Verify buyer-specific features (saved properties, search alerts)
Logout and login as seller (jane.smith@example.com / password123)
Check seller dashboard features (my listings, inquiries, analytics)
Test agent dashboard if agent user available
testCases.expectedOutcome: Role-based dashboards with appropriate features for each user type

testCases.name: Property Inquiry System Test
testCases.description: Test communication system between buyers and property owners
steps: Navigate to a property detail page
Find and test property inquiry form
Submit inquiry with contact information and message
Login as property owner to check received inquiries
Test inquiry response functionality
Verify inquiry status tracking
testCases.expectedOutcome: Working inquiry system allowing communication between buyers and sellers

testCases.name: Saved Properties Feature Test
testCases.description: Test ability to save and manage favorite properties
steps: Login as buyer user
Browse property listings
Test 'save property' or 'favorite' functionality
Navigate to saved properties page
Verify saved properties display correctly
Test removing properties from saved list
Check saved properties persist across sessions
testCases.expectedOutcome: Functional saved properties system with persistent storage

testCases.name: Responsive Design Test
testCases.description: Test application responsiveness across different screen sizes
steps: Test application on desktop resolution (1920x1080)
Test on tablet resolution (768x1024)
Test on mobile resolution (375x667)
Verify navigation adapts to screen size
Check property listings display properly on all sizes
Test forms and buttons are accessible on mobile
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays and functions properly across all device sizes

testCases.name: Form Validation Test
testCases.description: Test form validation across registration, login, and inquiry forms
steps: Test registration form with invalid email format
Test registration with weak password
Test login form with empty fields
Test property inquiry form validation
Verify error messages display appropriately
Test successful form submissions
testCases.expectedOutcome: Proper form validation with clear error messages and successful submission handling

testCases.name: Property Creation Test
testCases.description: Test property listing creation for sellers and agents
steps: Login as seller user (jane.smith@example.com / password123)
Navigate to create listing page
Fill out property creation form with all required fields
Test photo upload functionality if available
Submit new property listing
Verify property appears in user's listings
Check property is searchable by other users
testCases.expectedOutcome: Sellers can successfully create and manage property listings

testCases.name: Advanced Search Filters Test
testCases.description: Test advanced search filters specific to nature/scenic properties
steps: Access property search with advanced filters
Test natural features filters (ocean front, mountain view, etc.)
Test outdoor amenities filters (pool, hiking trails, etc.)
Test land size and square footage filters
Test year built and property condition filters
Combine multiple filters and verify results
Test filter reset functionality
testCases.expectedOutcome: Advanced search filters work correctly and return appropriate results

testCases.name: User Profile Management Test
testCases.description: Test user profile editing and preference management
steps: Login and navigate to profile settings
Test editing basic profile information (name, phone, etc.)
Test updating notification preferences
Test changing countries of interest
Test profile photo upload if available
Save changes and verify they persist
Test password change functionality
testCases.expectedOutcome: Users can successfully manage their profile information and preferences

testCases.name: Notification System Test
testCases.description: Test notification system for inquiries and updates
steps: Login as seller with existing inquiries
Check for notification indicators in navigation
Navigate to notifications page
Verify inquiry notifications display
Test marking notifications as read
Check notification counts update correctly
testCases.expectedOutcome: Notification system properly displays and manages user notifications

testCases.name: Property Photos Gallery Test
testCases.description: Test property photo galleries and image display
steps: Navigate to property with multiple photos
Test photo gallery navigation (next/previous)
Test photo zoom or lightbox functionality
Verify photos load properly and display correctly
Test photo captions if available
Check primary photo displays in listings
testCases.expectedOutcome: Property photos display correctly with functional gallery navigation

testCases.name: Location-Based Search Test
testCases.description: Test location-specific search functionality for Central American properties
steps: Test search by country (Costa Rica, Belize, Mexico, etc.)
Test search by region/state within countries
Test search by city/town
Verify location hierarchy works correctly
Test location autocomplete if available
Check map integration if present
testCases.expectedOutcome: Location-based search works accurately for Central American and Caribbean properties

testCases.name: Price and Currency Handling Test
testCases.description: Test price display and currency handling across different properties
steps: Browse properties with different price ranges
Verify price formatting displays correctly
Check currency symbols and formatting (USD, local currencies)
Test price range filters with various amounts
Verify price sorting functionality
Check price display consistency across pages
testCases.expectedOutcome: Prices display correctly with proper formatting and currency handling

testCases.name: Property Analytics Test
testCases.description: Test analytics features for property owners
steps: Login as seller with existing properties
Navigate to property analytics or dashboard
Check view count tracking
Verify inquiry count displays
Test analytics date ranges if available
Check performance metrics for listings
testCases.expectedOutcome: Property owners can view analytics and performance data for their listings

testCases.name: Help and Support Pages Test
testCases.description: Test help, terms, and privacy pages for completeness
steps: Navigate to help/support page
Verify help content is relevant to real estate platform
Check terms of service page exists and loads
Verify privacy policy page exists and loads
Test contact information or support forms
Check FAQ section if available
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete help and legal pages with relevant real estate platform content

testCases.name: Error Handling Test
testCases.description: Test application error handling and user feedback
steps: Test invalid URLs/routes (404 handling)
Test form submission with server errors
Test network connectivity issues
Verify error messages are user-friendly
Test recovery from error states
Check loading states during API calls
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application handles errors gracefully with appropriate user feedback

testCases.name: Performance and Loading Test
testCases.description: Test application performance and loading times
steps: Measure initial page load time
Test property search response time
Check image loading performance
Test navigation between pages
Verify loading indicators display during operations
Check for any console errors or warnings
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application loads efficiently with good performance and proper loading feedback

testCases.name: Data Persistence Test
testCases.description: Test data persistence across browser sessions
steps: Login and save some properties
Set search preferences or filters
Close browser and reopen application
Verify login state persists appropriately
Check saved properties are still available
Test search preferences persistence
testCases.expectedOutcome: User data and preferences persist appropriately across browser sessions

testCases.name: Basic Accessibility Test
testCases.description: Test basic accessibility features and keyboard navigation
steps: Test keyboard navigation through main interface
Check for alt text on property images
Verify form labels are properly associated
Test focus indicators on interactive elements
Check color contrast for readability
Test with screen reader if available
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application meets basic accessibility standards for inclusive use

testCases.name: Multi-language Support Test
testCases.description: Test multi-language support if available for international properties
steps: Check for language selection options
Test switching between languages if available
Verify property descriptions in multiple languages
Check currency and date formatting for different locales
Test search functionality in different languages
testCases.expectedOutcome: Multi-language support works correctly for international real estate platform
testCases.note: This test may not be applicable if multi-language support is not implemented

test_execution_notes: Tests should be run in order of priority (critical -> high -> medium -> low)
Authentication tests require valid user credentials from test_users.json
Some tests depend on seed data being present in the database
Property-specific tests should use the sample properties from the seed data
Role-based tests require logging in as different user types
Performance tests should be run on a stable network connection
Accessibility tests may require additional tools or browser extensions

expected_application_behavior.primary_function: Real estate platform specializing in properties with natural features and scenic views
key_features: Property search with natural feature filters
